title: More than 100 Prime Video Originals are coming to Amazon Freevee
description: Amazon added more than 50 Amazon Original shows to its subscription-free Freevee channel, with more to come.

title: Your Galaxy S21 just got a cool new trick normally reserved for the newest phones
description: Now available on the Galaxy S21 and Galaxy Z Fold 4, Astrophotography Mode will help you find constellations.

title: This concept imagines Windows 12 with a taskbar to please everyone and more
description: Thanks to a mockup from a YouTube video, we can see a possible taskbar design that looks to really shake up the UI in a great way.

title: Nvidia RTX 4060 Ti GPU could arrive at the end of May – but RTX 4060 isn’t on the horizon
description: While the RTX 4060 Ti now seems very likely to be released this month, it might be a longer wait for the RTX 4060.

title: Barry season 4 has HBO Max subscribers in absolute shock
description: Barry season 4 is shocking fans, as episode 4 leaves a line of bodies in its wake – but where can the show go from here?

title: 5 Ways the 'Godfather of AI' thinks AI could ruin everything
description: Geoffrey Hinton left Google so he could speak freely about AI; what he told The New York Times is alarming

title: Meta announces June VR showcase, but don’t expect the Oculus Quest 3
description: The next Meta Quest Gaming Showcase is happening in June, but don't expect the Oculus Quest 3 to make an appearance.

title: The Super Mario Bros. movie breaks a box office record – as Twitter pirates it
description: The Super Mario Bros. movie hits big at the global box office, while millions of Twitter users get in on the action for free.

title: DNA sequencing platform hit by serious security flaws
description: One of the two vulnerabilities discovered carries a 10/10 severity score.

title: Leaked Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 5 renders reveal a larger cover screen
description: We've got high-resolution renders of the Galaxy Z Flip 5 to share, and there's one very noticeable design change.

title: Global cloud growth is slowing at last
description: Cloud spend continues to grow, but not at the rate it once did, new figures show.

title: Apple watchOS 10 set to add widgets in a major interface revamp
description: The watchOS 10 update is due to be unveiled next month, and we've got some early indications about what's included.

title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Monday, May 1 (game #462)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

title: I found the cheapest 8K monitor but there’s just a tiny problem
description: The Samsung QN700B is the cheapest 8K TV right now, it is also the cheapest 8K monitor you can buy.
